description: Manage the state of policies in RabbitMQ.

node.description: Erlang node name of the rabbit we wish to configure.

name.description: The name of the policy to manage.

tags.description: A dict or string describing the policy.

pattern.description: A regex of queues to apply the policy to.

vhost.description: The name of the vhost to apply to.

apply_to.description: What the policy applies to. Requires RabbitMQ 3.2.0 or later.
